title: Some apps placed in stop state

updates.contents: All apps have been restored to their correct state. Very few users seem to have been impacted. Apologies for the inconvenience.
updates.title: Some apps placed in stop state

updates.contents: Customers have reported being unable to start Java apps on CloudFoundry.com. We are aware of the issue and are actively investigating the matter.
updates.title: During scheduled maintenance, a handful of user apps were inadvertently placed in stopped state.
